title: ‘American Idol’ Alum Corey Clark Arrested and Charged With Domestic Violence (REPORT)
content:
According to TMZ , American Idol alum Corey Clark — a season 2 contestant who was once rumored to have had an affair with Paula Abdul — has been arrested and charged with domestic violence . 
 
The 35-year-old is allegedly currently behind bars in Yuma, Ariz. after being arrested last night. 
 

 
(Photo Credit: ) 
 
TMZ claims he was also charged with aggravated harassment and failure to comply. As of press time, his relationship to the alleged victim is unknown. 
 
RELATED: ‘American Idol’ Alum Constantine Maroulis Charged With Domestic Violence 
 
Corey previously sued Fox after he was dropped from AI for failing to disclose a prior arrest, which occurred after he got into a “scuffle” with his sister. He pleaded no contest to the previous charges. 
 
He’s allegedly due to appear in court later this afternoon.
